boone.io

Class IOFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • boone.io.IOFilter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooneFilter, CSVPatternFilter, Proben1PatternFilter, SNNSNetFilter, SNNSPatternFilter

    public abstract class IOFilter
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the base filter for loading and saving networks and patterns. Data is written to or read from the given IO file. The specific filter determines the data format. Boone native files are loaded/stored using the BooneFilter. You may also write custom filters by extending this class.
    Since:
    14. Sept. 2004
    Version:
    $Id: IOFilter.java 2292 2016-01-15 16:52:18Z helmut $
    Author:
    August Mayer, Helmut A. Mayer

      • readValues

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.Double> readValues(StreamParser parser,
                                                      int count,
                                                      char separator,
                                                      java.util.List<java.lang.Double> values)
                                               throws java.io.IOException
        Reads 'count' double values from a pattern file.
        Parameters:
        parser - the parser
        count - the number of values to read
        separator - the character separating the values
        values - a container for the values, if null it is created
        Returns:
        the container with values
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file format is incorrect
